a hard cheese from Switzerland with large holes in it: I made cheese bread topped with grated Emmental. Emmenthal has its famous holes and a nutty flavour. Emmenthaler is a great Swiss cheese, perfect for melting. Add cubes of Gruyere and Emmentaler cheese and stir until the cheese melts.
More examplesFewer examplesThe burger was topped with a with a slice of Emmental and a slice of tomato.The holes in Emmenthal are the result of the lactic acid in the cheese undergoing a secondary fermentation.The leaflet includes a recipe for fondue, made with Emmental cheese.Emmenthaler is a sweet, nutty cow's milk cheese and is named after Switzerland's Emmental valley.
